title: Blue Week
subtitle: 6 days of total immersion into the world of freediving.
introText: Our Blue Week takes place over 6 intensive days, in the same location with the same group of people. You may stumble upon some of your fears and realize that you are not alone. When all is over, you'll probably cry and not want to say goodbye to your new friends.
description1: We work with everyone individually, diving together on the rope. We see your mistakes and feelings underwater, correcting them immediately with feedback after every dive.
description2: For us, freediving is about total enjoyment. Your dives will be completely relaxedâ€”not a strangled battle for a new PB. Depths reached by force will become easily accessible.
description3: Learn to dive safely with someone who knows how to watch over you. We teach you to become a good and reliable safety partner in the water.
description4: We are the only freediving school in the Adriatic with a no limits sled. Focus purely on equalization while the instructor controls the descent.
description5: Our boat has 3 fixed lines visible on sonar, enabling us to monitor all deeper dives. A comfortable platform for warm-up and preparation.
description6: Povljana on Pag island is ideal for freedivers. Depths up to 80m within 15 minutes, visibility around 20m, and nearby bays for static training.
scheduleText: Two dive sessions per dayâ€”morning before breakfast and afternoon. Theory and dry exercises fill the gaps: breathing, relaxation, yoga, diaphragm flexibility, and equalization. One day is reserved for a boat excursion combining depth training with fun diving at nearby attractions. Fabulous sunsets in Povljana, and with luck, wild dolphins at sea.
scheduleNote: Suitable for beginners and advanced freedivers.
includes2: 5 nights in shared apartments in Povljana
